definition: to have no other choice/to be the last resort
pinyin: bu4 de2 yi3 er2 wei2 zhi1

definition: (negative prefix)/not/no
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
already/to stop/then/afterwards
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5])/him/her/it

sentences.english: Yeah, you've got to do what you've got to do. Pretty much.
sentences.chinese: 对，差不多吧，不得已而为之。

sentences.english: That you've got to do what you've got to do in a case like that.
sentences.chinese: 在那种情况下，你只能不得已而为之。

sentences.english: This time, the prosecution of Fu Sheng, is the last ditch.
sentences.chinese: 这一次起诉傅盛，实属不得已而为之。

sentences.english: You got to do what you got to do, pretty much.
sentences.chinese: 差不多吧，不得已而为之。

definition: to have no alternative (idiom); compelled by circumstances/forced into sth
plan of convenience (idiom); stop-gap measure/makeshift stratagem/interim step
to act against one's will/to have no alternative but to/to have to/to have no choice/must
stratagem of convenience (idiom); stop-gap measure/makeshift plan/interim step
sensible act
pardonable (of interruption, misunderstanding etc)
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
to have no other choice
delaying tactics/stalling/measures to stave off an attack/stratagem to win a respite
if you ride a tiger, it's hard to get off (idiom); fig. impossible to stop halfway
expedient
human nature (idiom)/a behavior that is only natural
an emergency measure
original idea/real intention/etymon
irreproachable (idiom)/nothing blameworthy about it at all
lit. to go to war without just cause (idiom)/to act without justification
